content: अप्सु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नास्ति प्सु रूपं यस्य <ls>Nir.</ls>] {@--1@} Formless, shapeless. {@--2@} Not beautiful. Note --अप्सु forms the first member of several compounds. --क्षित् a god. --चर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} aquatic; moving in waters. --ज, --जा {%<ab>a.</ab>%} born in the waters or in the atmosphere. (--जाः) --योनिः {1} a horse. {2} a cane or reed. --जित् vanquishing the aerial Asuras. --मत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} possessed of what is in water; not losing one's nature in water (as lightning); getting sufficient water.
